#generated by https://sequencediagram.org/

title UpdateFares Sequence

actor "Admin : admin" as a
boundary "AdminInerface : adminInerface" as b
control "AdminController : adminController" as c
entity "Route : route" as d
entity "Fare : fare" as e

a->>b: Open
activate a
activate b
b->>c: viewUpdateFaresPage
activate c
deactivateafter a
deactivateafter b
c->>d: getRoutes
activate d
d-->>c: routes
deactivateafter d
c-->>b: routes
activate b
deactivateafter c
b->>b: display\nroutes
activate b
activate a
a->>b: Select route
deactivateafter b
deactivateafter a
b->>c: route Selected
activate c
deactivateafter b
c->>e: getFare(route)
activate e
e-->>c: fare
deactivateafter e
c-->>b: fare
deactivateafter c
activate b
b->>b: display\nfare
activate a
activate b
a->>b: Enter newFare
deactivateafter b
deactivateafter a
b->>c: newFare Entered
activate c
deactivateafter b
c->>e: setFare(newFare)
activate e
deactivateafter c
